SEARCH
Package se.swedenconnect.ca.cmc.api.client.impl

Class AbstractCMCClient

java.lang.Object
se.swedenconnect.ca.cmc.api.client.impl.AbstractCMCClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
CMCClient
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultCMCClient, PreConfiguredCMCClient
public abstract class AbstractCMCClient extends Object implements CMCClient
Abstract implementation of a CMC Client used to execute CA management operations via CMC on a remote CA
Author:
Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractCMCClient

      public AbstractCMCClient(String cmcRequestUrl, se.swedenconnect.security.credential.PkiCredential cmcClientCredential, String algorithm, X509Certificate cmcResponseCert, X509Certificate caCertificate) throws MalformedURLException, org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, CertificateEncodingException
      Constructor for the CMC Client.
      Parameters:
      cmcRequestUrl - URL where CMC requests are sent to the remote CA
      cmcClientCredential - the private key and certificate for the CMC client
      algorithm - CMC signing algorithm
      cmcResponseCert - signing certificate of the remote CA CMC responder
      caCertificate - CA certificate used by the remote CA to issue certificates
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException - malformed URL
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - algorithm is not supported or recognized
      org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException - error setting up CMC client
      CertificateEncodingException - error parsing provided certificates

  • Method Details

    • getAllCertSerialNumbers

      public CMCResponse getAllCertSerialNumbers() throws CMCException
      Request a list of all certificate serial numbers in the current CA repository
      Specified by:
      getAllCertSerialNumbers in interface CMCClient
      Returns:
      CMC response with certificate serial numbers or appropriate status information
      Throws:
      CMCException - error processing the request or communicating with the remote CA

    • issueCertificate

      public CMCResponse issueCertificate(se.swedenconnect.ca.engine.ca.models.cert.CertificateModel certificateModel) throws CMCException
      Issue a certificate
      Specified by:
      issueCertificate in interface CMCClient
      Parameters:
      certificateModel - certificate model describing the content of the certificate to be issued
      Returns:
      CMC response with issued certificate or appropriate status information
      Throws:
      CMCException - error processing the request or communicating with the remote CA

    • issueCertificate

      public CMCResponse issueCertificate(se.swedenconnect.ca.engine.ca.models.cert.CertificateModel certificateModel, PrivateKey certReqPrivate, String p10Algorithm, byte[] regInfo) throws CMCException
      Issue a certificate allowing a PKCS#10 request to be requested. A PKCS#10 request format will be used if a private key is provided. If not, the CRMF request format will be used.
      Specified by:
      issueCertificate in interface CMCClient
      Parameters:
      certificateModel - certificate model describing the content of the certificate to be issued
      certReqPrivate - private key associated with the public key in the certificate request
      p10Algorithm - the algorithm used to sign the pkcs#10 request (MUST be provided if a private key is provided)
      regInfo - optional regInfo data to be included in the CMC request as additional data to the CA
      Returns:
      CMC response with issued certificate or appropriate status information
      Throws:
      CMCException - error processing the request or communicating with the remote CA

    • getIssuedCertificate

      public CMCResponse getIssuedCertificate(BigInteger serialNumber) throws CMCException
      Send a request to retrieve a particular certificate.
      Specified by:
      getIssuedCertificate in interface CMCClient
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - serial number of the certificate to retrieve
      Returns:
      CMC response with the retrieved certificate or appropriate status information
      Throws:
      CMCException - error processing the request or communicating with the remote CA

    • revokeCertificate

      public CMCResponse revokeCertificate(BigInteger serialNumber, int reason, Date revocationDate) throws CMCException
      Send a request to revoke a certificate
      Specified by:
      revokeCertificate in interface CMCClient
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - the serial number of the certificate to revoke
      reason - the reason code for the revocation
      revocationDate - the date of revocation
      Returns:
      CMC response with appropriate status information
      Throws:
      CMCException - error processing the request or communicating with the remote CA

    • listCertificates

      public CMCResponse listCertificates(int pageSize, int pageIndex, se.swedenconnect.ca.engine.ca.repository.SortBy sortBy, boolean notRevoked, boolean descending) throws CMCException
      Send a request to list a range of certificates in the CA repository. This function divide certificates into pages with a fixed amount of certificates in each page. This function allows to retrieve a page of certificates and to specify the conditions for constructing this page.
      Specified by:
      listCertificates in interface CMCClient
      Parameters:
      pageSize - the number of certificates in each page
      pageIndex - the index of the page of the requested size to return
      sortBy - indication of whether pages of certificates should be sorted by issue date or serial number
      notRevoked - tue to exclude all revoked certificates from the pages of certificates
      descending - true to use descending sorting order
      Returns:
      the identified page of certificates
      Throws:
      CMCException - on error processing the request

    • getCertificateModelBuilder

      public CMCCertificateModelBuilder getCertificateModelBuilder(PublicKey subjectPublicKey, se.swedenconnect.ca.engine.ca.models.cert.CertNameModel<?> subject, boolean includeCrlDPs, boolean includeOcspURL) throws CMCException
      Return a certificate model builder prepared for creating certificate models for certificate requests to this CA service via CMC
      Specified by:
      getCertificateModelBuilder in interface CMCClient
      Parameters:
      subjectPublicKey - the public key of the subject
      subject - subject name data
      includeCrlDPs - true to include CRL distribution point URLs in the issued certificate
      includeOcspURL - true to include OCSP URL (if present) in the issued certificate
      Returns:
      certificate model builder
      Throws:
      CMCException - errors obtaining the certificate model builder

    • getCAInformation

      public CAInformation getCAInformation(boolean forceRecache) throws CMCException
      Send a CMC request to obtain information about the remote CA
      Specified by:
      getCAInformation in interface CMCClient
      Parameters:
      forceRecache - set to true to force this request to be sent and processed by the remote CA and set to false to allow the API to return cached information if it is reasonably fresh
      Returns:
      CA information about the remote CA
      Throws:
      CMCException - on error processing the request

    • getCaInfo

      protected CMCResponse getCaInfo() throws CMCException
      Request information about the remote CA
      Returns:
      CMC response with CA information or appropriate status information
      Throws:
      CMCException - error processing the request or communicating with the remote CA
